Dialogue.Value: It’s a beautiful cyber-cherry tree!
CALM WATER IS FAR MORE,SOOTHING THAN DIRTY OLD,TREES，RIGHT?
FILLED WITH POLLEN AND,INSECTS，ICK! I HEARD THEY,GROW IN DIRT!
THESE TREES ARE MORE,BEAUTIFUL THAN SOME,BORING WATER，RIGHT?
WHO EVEN DRINKS WATER?,AND WHAT DO FISH,EVEN DO IN THERE?
YOU HEAR THAT?!
It is said that all data deleted in,the past gathers around this,tree.
To pursue ultimate power....,I pushed myself to the limits,of what was thought possible....
In the end....,My own body had nothing,left to give....
I have no interest in weaklings,who have sacrificed nothing....,Leave me to my misery....
You think you can succeed,where I had failed....?
Come....,I will show you the mistake,you have made....
Are you here to mock me，,to rub salt in my wounds....?
Do you think me powerless,in this state....?,A helpless victim....?
I will show you how wrong,you are!
To allow viruses to reduce,you to such a state....
How far has the art of battling,fallen....?
Leave，before I mistake your,incompetence for an insult....
Unbelievable....,To have taken my style,and perfected it....
THANK YOU FOR SAVING,ME FROM THOSE AWFUL，,AWFUL NAVIS!
WELCOME TO HEAVEN,SQUARE! WE DON’T GET,MANY VISITORS!
I’M THE SPRITE THAT,CONNECTS LINK GATES!
I CAN LINK THIS SQUARE，,SUCH AS IT IS， TO YOUR,HOMEPAGE!
THE CONNECTION FEE IS,45000 ZENNY!
CREATE A LINK?
UNFORTUNATELY，YOU,DON’T HAVE ENOUGH,MONEY!
LINK CREATED!
I HOPE TO SEE YOU AGAIN,SOON!
NORMALLY THIS WHOLE,AREA IS A SAFE PLACE!
BUT SOMETHING HAS,DRIVEN ALL THE SPIRITS,INTO A FRENZY!
JUST WHAT IS THE ,CYBERWORLD COMING TO?
I can move on，freed from my,regrets....!,At last....!
I see now....,You wanted to prove that you,could follow in my footsteps....
And for you to not only survive，,but thrive....!
It’s an old playbook filled to,the brim with battle strategies,and modification plans.
The departed spirit left,something behind....
The final page has been angrily,scratched out，but the number,“11111111” is barely legible.
It looks like the previous,owner had a habit of using,random items as bookmarks!
